title: FES-EO (Educational Opportunities)
description: The Florida Tax Credit Scholarship Program - Educational Opportunities (FES-EO) provides scholarships to eligible Florida students from low-income families to attend participating private schools. This program helps families of children with autism access educational environments that may better suit their needs, including schools with specialized autism programs or smaller class sizes. Scholarships cover tuition, fees, and may include funding for therapy services when provided as part of the educational program. Eligibility is based on household income and other qualifying criteria.
